title: He Won't Let Me Fight Her
itunes:title: He Won't Let Me Fight Her
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been dating an amazing guy for two years and I feel like I have finally found my future husband. He is great with my kids and my family loves him. I couldn’t have asked for a better man to enter my life, but there’s just problem. It’s his ex-girlfriend that won’t go away. He was honest about a crazy ex that he had a bad breakup with and he’s been trying to end all of the communication with her, but she seems to be slow and does not understand when he says to leave him alone.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been dating an amazing guy for two years and I feel like I have finally found my future husband. He is great with my kids and my family loves him. I couldn’t have asked for a better man to enter my life, but there’s just problem. It’s his ex-girlfriend that won’t go away. He was honest about a crazy ex that he had a bad breakup with and he’s been trying to end all of the communication with her, but she seems to be slow and does not understand when he says to leave him alone.................
